availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Cason (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmhand and farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmhand and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Hawkins Cason and Sarah Cason. Resident of Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1850. Farmhand in Harrison County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 128A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 395.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 501.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 111B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Rutland, District 5, p. 120A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, June-July 1863.
